title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Aptos (APT) Surges 16.6% as All Assets Trade Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Litecoin (LTC) was also among the top performers, gaining 7.3%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3194.09, up 3.3% (+101.56) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: APT (+16.6%) and LTC (+7.3%).

Laggards: BTC (+2.4%) and ADA (+2.4%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: All 20 assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading higher with significant gains for APT (+16.6%) and LTC (+7.3%), indicating broad market positivity.
